===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|countable|uncountable}} [[history]] {{zh-mw|段}}
#: {{zh-x|歷史 感|sense of '''history'''}}
#: {{zh-x|歷史 觀點|view of '''history'''}}
#: {{zh-x|縱觀 歷史|throughout '''history'''}}
#: {{zh-x|古代 歷史|ancient '''history'''}}
#: {{zh-x|歷史 故事|stories from '''history'''}}
#: {{zh-x|歷史 是 由 勝利者 書寫 的。|'''History''' is written by the victors.}}

====Usage notes====
Just like in English, the Chinese term {{zh-l|歷史}} can refer to ''history'' as in the study of past events, as well as the past considered as a whole, or connected with a particular person or thing.
